mapper.select: SELECT u.id, password, name, nickname, phone, address, level, regdate, auth FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_auth AS auth ON u.id = auth.id WHERE u.id = #{username}
SELECT id FROM user WHERE id = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(id, password, name, nickname, phone, address, level, regdate) VALUES( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{level}, sysdate() )
mapper.update: UPDATE INTO user(id, password, name, nickname, phone, address, level) VALUES( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{level} )
